{"id":826669721,"question_id":15,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"2 years, 4 months","timestamp":1666278134,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1004 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/826669721/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"18.3 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def threeSum(self, nums: List[int]) -> List[List[int]]:\n        nums.sort()\n        \n        res=[]\n        \n        for i in range(len(nums)):\n            if i>0 and nums[i-1]==nums[i]:\n                continue\n            \n            left,right=i+1,len(nums)-1\n            while left<right:\n                threeSum=nums[left]+nums[right]+nums[i]\n                if threeSum<0:\n                    left+=1\n                    \n                elif threeSum>0:\n                    right-=1\n\n                else:\n                    res.append([nums[left],nums[right],nums[i]])\n                    left+=1\n                    while left<right and nums[left]==nums[left-1]:\n                        left+=1\n        return res","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
